Diners Club Credit Card
Your ideal travel companion
Your Emirates NBD Diners Club Credit Card entitles you to savings on travel, dining, entertainment and more all over the world
Earn upto 1.5% Plus Points on your retail spends
Complimentary airport lounge access worldwide
Up to 30% discount at over 2,000 restaurants across the UAE

Know more
Unlimited complimentary lounge access worldwide
Indulge in over 1,500 comfortable premium lounges in more than 700 cities worldwide
Simply present your Diners Club card at any participating airport lounge and enter immediately no matter which airline or airline class you're travelling in. Supplementary cardholders can use this benefit too.
Enjoy unlimited complimentary visits for self*. Additional guests will be charged extra.
*Minimum spend criteria applies.
Learn more about claiming Diners Club benefits
